title: Truck Ease
description: Truck Ease is a user-friendly mobile application that enables individuals to easily book trucks for transportation purposes. Similar to popular ride-sharing apps, users can request a truck for moving or delivering items. Truck drivers using the app can accept these requests, facilitating a convenient process for both parties.

title: Tamworth24
description: The Dashboard — Home of our innovative app offers users a centralized hub for an immersive and streamlined experience. Stay effortlessly informed with timely notifications, ensuring you never miss a relevant update.

title: Realty Pro Shots
description: This app is perfect for Real estate agents, remodelers, interior designers, builders, and anyone else that takes their own real estate photos and is looking to take their real estate photography to the next level!

title: Pujam Pandal
description: Puja Event Management Software. Features include Auctions, Bidding, Pandal Donation, Pandal Creation, and Community Posts for pandal events.

title: Vip Satta
description: A gaming application built with Native Android, featuring real-time bidding and gaming mechanics.

title: MyC2i
description: This app mainly works related to Islamic dawat. It deals with nearby mosques and various Islamic hadiths, dawat-related discussions. Users can donate to specific mosques or madrasas.

title: eDoctor
description: This project is an Android Mobile Application which allows users to obtain information about doctors. The app can also save all information related to the treatment of patients.

title: PIMIS
fullTitle: Patient's Integrated Medical Info System (Native Android)
description: An Android Mobile Application which allows users to obtain information about doctors and hospitals nearby. The app saves all information related to patient treatment history.

title: Summary
description: A web development project showcasing modern frontend techniques and responsive design.

title: Finance
description: A finance management web application with dashboard and data visualization features.
